snippet.title: Shop Simulator: Pet Shop Trailer
snippet.description:
In SHOP SIMULATOR: PET SHOP you can fulfill your dream of running a pet store. Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of retail and keep your customers happy. You and up to three friends can customize your store and take care of all the needs of a pet store. 

Check out the trailer and WISHLIST NOW on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3194510/Shop_Simulator_Pet_Shop/

Follow us on: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61561518361104
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/three_river_games/
X: https://x.com/3RiverG 
Discord: https://discord.gg/WpxwA9B8G3
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/ThreeRiverGames/
